page.title: 04A GROUP SURVEY
page.content: A survey of a group of people in our area was carried out. The total number involved was 240 adults and 260 children. A number of questions were asked involving 3 generations, the children,their parents and their grandparents.The results of the survey were as follows:- CHILDREN (Born between 1973 and 1976) Most popular names for girls were:- {LOUISE, ANN, CLAIRE AND JANE. Most popular names for boys were:- {PAUL,ANTHONY,LEE AND JAMES. The average number of children in their families was{2.4.} {85%}of the children are {RIGHT HANDED. {8%}of the children {WEAR GLASSES. {45%}of the children have {BLUE EYES. {20%}of the children have {BROWN EYES. {17%}of the children have {HAZEL EYES {14%}of the children have {GREEN EYES.
